titleStmt.title: A continuation of a former Just appeal from lower courts on earth to the highest court in heaven in the case of F.B. about his not taking the oath of allegiance under his circumstances
titleStmt.author: Bampfield, Francis, 1615 or 16-1683.
Bampfield, Francis, 1615 or 16-1683. A just appeal from lower courts on earth to the highest court in heaven.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
